import Mathlib

variable {n : â„•}

/-- Mean value inequality for multivariable functions (user statement).
Assumes f : â„^n â†’ â„ is differentiable on a convex set U and the operator norm
of the derivative is bounded by M on U, then
|f y - f x - (fderiv â„ f x) (y - x)| â‰¤ M * â€–y - xâ€–.
Note: This file only contains the statement (proof omitted).
-/
theorem mean_value_inequality {f : (Fin n â†’ â„) â†’ â„} {U : Set (Fin n â†’ â„)} {M : â„}
  {x y : Fin n â†’ â„} :
  Convex U â†’
  x âˆˆ U â†’ y âˆˆ U â†’
  DifferentiableOn â„ f U â†’
  (âˆ€ z âˆˆ U, â€–fderiv â„ f zâ€– â‰¤ M) â†’
  |f y - f x - (fderiv â„ f x) (y - x)| â‰¤ M * â€–y - xâ€– := by sorry

import Mathlib

variable {n : â„•}

/-- Mean value inequality for multivariable functions (user statement).
Assumes f : â„^n â†’ â„ is differentiable on a convex set U and the operator norm
of the derivative is bounded by M on U, then
|f y - f x - (fderiv â„ f x) (y - x)| â‰¤ M * â€–y - xâ€–.
Note: This file only contains the statement (proof omitted).
-/
theorem mean_value_inequality {f : (Fin n â†’ â„) â†’ â„} {U : Set (Fin n â†’ â„)} {M : â„}
  {x y : Fin n â†’ â„} :
  Convex â„ U â†’
  x âˆˆ U â†’ y âˆˆ U â†’
  DifferentiableOn â„ f U â†’
  (âˆ€ z âˆˆ U, â€–fderiv â„ f zâ€– â‰¤ M) â†’
  |f y - f x - (fderiv â„ f x) (y - x)| â‰¤ M * â€–y - xâ€– := by sorry
